message.body: Should I learn alto or tenor sax parts for the 21st?
Also you can crash at my pad if you still need to
Awesome, thanks. Either is good, i'll be on soprano

I just looked at the tunes willie sent me, and had the realization that I'm definitely not gonna be able to learn and memorize all of that by sunday. Especially cause I have to work every day before that. Sorry man
I'd rather not make you guys sound like shit though
Are you good at reading on sax? One of our trumpeters made marching size music for a lyre, maybe he can make extras
Yea I can read for sure
I don't have a lyre though
I can buy one though they're not expensive
Alright- I practiced up and imbetter than I thought I would be. Got a lyre coming to me. Definitely need lyre sized music though so if you can make sure the trumpet player brings that ill be set
If he can't I can try and whip something up but I just need to know asap cause I have a lot of work and rehearsing comin up this week. Sorry to be so needy
He told me he just printed the book with 4 to a page, so i can whip that up for you if you want.
This is gonna be fun I like the tunes and forgot how much fun playing a horn can be
